title: The Inquisitor’s Key: A Pre-Release Book Review
post: The Shroud of Turin features rather prominently in this novel, and anyone interested in testing the Shroud with modern forensic techniques should read this one. I did some snooping around and found that the author’s giving away a bunch of copies on his blog which is right here:   http://jonjeffersonauthor.blogspot.com/2012/05/book-giveaway-inquisitors-key.html
author: Ron Barbary
